GCylinder.h
1 // Cylinder.h
3 // ==========
4 // Cylinder for OpenGL with (base radius, top radius, height, sectors, stacks)
5 // The min number of sectors (slices) is 3 and the min number of stacks are 1.
6 // - base radius: the radius of the cylinder at z = -height/2
7 // - top radius : the radiusof the cylinder at z = height/2
8 // - height : the height of the cylinder along z-axis
9 // - sectors : the number of slices of the base and top caps
10 // - stacks : the number of subdivisions along z-axis
11 //
12 // AUTHOR: Song Ho Ahn (song.ahn@gmail.com)
13 // CREATED: 2018-03-27
14 // UPDATED: 2019-12-02
15 // See: http://www.songho.ca/opengl/gl_cylinder.html
17 
18 #ifndef GB_GEOMETRY_CYLINDER_H
19 #define GB_GEOMETRY_CYLINDER_H
20 
21 #include <vector>
22 #include <memory>
23 #include "../../geometry/GVector.h"
24 
25 namespace rev {
26 
28 // Forward Declarations
30 class VertexArrayData;
32 class Cylinder
33 {
34 public:
35  // ctor/dtor
36  Cylinder(VertexArrayData& outVertexData, float baseRadius = 1.0f, float topRadius = 1.0f, float height = 1.0f,
37  int sectorCount = 36, int stackCount = 1);
38  ~Cylinder() {}
39

41  float getBaseRadius() const { return m_baseRadius; }

43  float getHeight() const { return m_height; }

51  void setSectorCount(int sectorCount);
52  void setStackCount(int stackCount);
